title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: I expect that if there are no webapps deployed, accessing a URL should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps
3. Access a URL and note the HTTP response code and content
